name: Event Coordination
description: Help plan and run quarterly chapter meetings, the annual holiday party, and BSides Tampa. Includes venue coordination, speaker logistics, and day-of support.

name: Marketing & Social Media
description: Manage the chapter's LinkedIn presence, create event promotional graphics, and help grow community engagement online.

name: Speaker Outreach
description: Recruit speakers for chapter meetings and BSides Tampa. Review talk proposals and coordinate with presenters on topics and logistics.

name: Technology & Web
description: Maintain the chapter website, manage membership systems, and support technical infrastructure for events and communications.

name: Education & Training
description: Develop and deliver member-led classes, bootcamps, and study groups covering topics like CISSP prep, cloud security, and penetration testing.
